name: Gurias, Samonas and Abibus
troparia: (Tone 5) You gifted us with miracles of the saint martyrs* as with an invincible wall, O Christ God.* By their prayers crush the councils of pagans and empower our country** as You alone are good and love mankind.
kontakia: (Tone 2) O wise ones, you received grace from on high,* O all-praised ones, you watch over those who are amidst temptations.* Therefore, o saints, you delivered a maiden from a bitter death:** for you are truly the glory of Edessa and the joy of the world.
note: First day of the Nativity fast - can be a day with penitential order of services, unless falls on a weekend.
